Meteara looks at him with an expression of disbelief and panic. If she 
had been organic, her face would have turned white.

Meteara: They have a ship. If its cannons hit the mountainside, the 
sphere in it explodes. Do you realize what that means?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He turns around and looks at her questioningly.  "Why?  What 
has 
> changed?  I cannot know who to fight for without knowing why I must 
fight.  
> You've seen something, what is it?"  He stops, waiting for her 
reply.
